name: Metronet
0:
”Alexa, ask Metronet to tune to The Weather Channel”
”Alexa, tell Metronet to watch channel 3”
”Alexa, ask Metronet to search for Big Bang Theory”
skdetail:
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: metronet
Developer Terms of Use
des: Alexa lets you control your Metronet TV receiver with just your voice. You can ask Alexa to tune to a channel by channel number, call letters or name (i.e. Weather Channel). You can tell Alexa to watch a currently-airing program by title. Alexa can search for program names, actors or directors, eliminating painstaking entry of letter-by-letter search terms.
